useCase.name: Supply Accruals
useCase.description: Allows donor representatives to supply accruals to the Digital Archive Management System.

mainSequence.step: DonorRepresentative logs in via secure authentication.
Display donor dashboard upon successful authentication.
System displays form to select collection or create a new one.
DonorRepresentative fills form with accrual details and selects an existing collection.
System checks for existing collection details.
DonorRepresentative confirms the collection to supply accruals.
System creates/update record for incremental accrual and generates unique identifiers for new files.
Accrual is recorded in the database.
System displays success message "Accrual added successfully".
